entry.title: Friday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries or rain showers ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Friday 14 April 2023
